title.en: Diyar Al Muharraq Becomes First Real Estate Developer to Receive Building Licenses for Projects through Benayat Building Permit Portal

displayTitle.en: Diyar Al Muharraq Becomes First Real Estate Developer to Receive Building Licenses for Projects through Benayat Building Permit Portal

body.en:
Manama, Bahrain, 9th December 2018: Diyar Al Muharraq, one of the leading urban developers in the Kingdom of Bahrain, has announced its adoption of the Benayat system for the issuance of building permits for the construction of the Citys projects, thus enabling the Company to benefit from the services it provides.

As a result, Diyar Al Muharraq has now officially received licenses to build 173 residential villas in the city. Benayat is an electronic system for issuing building permits for all types of projects in the Kingdom of Bahrain, whether Residential, Investment, Commercial or Industrial. The system was inaugurated by His Royal Highness Prince Salman Bin Hamad Al Khalifa, Crown Prince, Deputy Supreme Commander and First Deputy Prime Minister of the Kingdom of Bahrain, during the Bahrain Government Forum 2018.

Benayat's platform provides users with enhanced services of high efficiency and productivity, contributing to the pace of investment, real estate and construction activities in the Kingdom, thus supporting the country's economic vision. By utilizing an interactive map that provides key information for land parcels, Benayat allows applicants to obtain all necessary information to prepare drawings and documents required to apply for a building permit, and pay building permit related fees.

Speaking on the occasion, Chief Executive Officer of Diyar Al Muharraq, Dr. Maher Al Shaer said: The introduction of the Benayat platform forms a dynamic, practical and comprehensive mechanism for the issuance of building permits. And in line with our keenness to comply with all building and construction regulations, we have utilized this building permit portal to issue licenses necessary to construct 173 villas throughout the development, and will continue to do so henceforth in the completion of our master-planned city. I would like to take this opportunity to thank His Royal Highness Prince Salman bin Hamad Al Khalifa, Crown Prince, Deputy Supreme Commander and First Deputy Prime Minister of the Kingdom of Bahrain for his great interest and guidance in the growth of both the real estate development sector in the Kingdom and the Bahraini economy. I would also like to commend all the official parties involved in the development and creation of this pioneering platform, which helps and eases the process of obtaining building licenses as well as plays an important role in consolidating communication between all concerned parties. We at Diyar Al Muharraq take great pride in being the first company in the Kingdom of Bahrain to take advantage of this platform, and through precedents such as this, we look forward to furthering the cooperation between the public and private sectors.

title.en: Dragon City Signs Corporate Agreement with Vega Intertrade and Exhibitions That Stipulates Operations & Lease of ThaiMart

displayTitle.en: Dragon City Signs Corporate Agreement with Vega Intertrade and Exhibitions That Stipulates Operations & Lease of ThaiMart

body.en:
Dragon City and Vega Intertrade and Exhibitions, one of the most sought-after exhibition and event organizers specialized in the Middle East and North Africa (MENA) region, signed a corporate agreement to lease and operate ThaiMart, a Thai-themed retail development in the master-planned project.

Signing of the Agreement took place on Sunday, the 2nd of December, 2018 at the Diyar Al Muharraq Headquarters at the Bahrain World Trade Centre in Manama by Dr. Maher Al Shaer, the Managing Director of Dragon City, and Mr. Akavut Tangsilikusonwong, the Managing Director of Vega Intertrade and Exhibitions, under the patronage of H.E. Thanis Na Songkhla, the Ambassador of the Kingdom of Thailand to the Kingdom of Bahrain, in the presence of members of the executive management of Dragon City.

Set in the southwest corner of Diyar Al Muharraq on a 6,000 square meter area next to Dragon City, ThaiMart is a first-of-its-kind Shopping Center which will offer both local consumers and tourists products that are exclusively imported directly from Thailand. With the soft opening of the Mart expected to take place in the first half of 2019, it is set to revolutionize the oriental goods industry in the Kingdom of Bahrain with the vast array of retail opportunities it will provide.

The project design is infused with Thai architectural and cultural aspects, in a layout which will incorporate approximately 150 individual retail store spaces, with a spacious car parking lot for customers vehicles.

Speaking on the occasion, the Managing Director of Dragon City, Dr. Maher Al Shaer said: It brings me immense pleasure to announce the agreement we have come to with Vega Intertrade and Exhibitions for the complete operations of what is set to be one of the flagship projects within our city, ThaiMart. With ThaiMart expected to further enhance the landscape of the retail industry in the Kingdom of Bahrain with the unique offerings that it provides, the Project will also significantly fulfill and augment the role that the city holds as a vital player in the economy of the Kingdom. Therefore, I would like to thank the Ministry of Industry, Commerce & Tourism, Bahrain Chamber of Commerce & Industry, and the Bahrain Economic Development Board for their great interest in and support for this visionary development.
Moreover, the concept of a Thai-themed shopping centre also serves to strengthen bilateral relations between Bahrain and Thailand, and the success it is envisioned to reap will reiterate the importance of supporting and enhancing the development of economic and investment cooperation between the two friendly countries. Therefore, we look forward to working with Vega Intertrade and Exhibitions for the manifestation of this promising development, he added.

ThaiMart will offer a variety of Thai products such as food items, beauty products, garments, perfumes, handcrafts, home decorations and leather goods made available for purchase to the people of the Kingdom of Bahrain, thereby setting it up to draw in a multitude of visitors on a regular basis.

Dragon City is a first of its kind development that encompasses over 787 commercial units, making it the largest wholesale and retail trading centre in the Kingdom of Bahrain. Situated to the South-West of Diyar Al Muharraq in close proximity to Bahrains International Airport, the state-of-the-art Khalifa Bin Salman Port and the Capital of the Kingdom of Bahrain, Manama, Dragon City caters to customers from both the Kingdom and beyond. Dragon City is infused with Chinese architectural and cultural aspects and offers Chinese products of the highest quality to local consumers, trade customers and tourists.

title.en: Chief Financial Officer of Diyar Al Muharraq Wins in 2 Distinguished Categories in Prestigious MENA CFO Awards - Mr. Subhas Chandra Awarded Finance Professional of the Year Title and Ranked Second in Revolutionary CFO of the Year

displayTitle.en: Chief Financial Officer of Diyar Al Muharraq Wins in 2 Distinguished Categories in Prestigious MENA CFO Awards - Mr. Subhas Chandra Awarded Finance Professional of the Year Title and Ranked Second in Revolutionary CFO of the Year

body.en:
Diyar Al Muharraq, one of the leading urban developers in the Kingdom of Bahrain, announced that its Chief Financial Officer, Mr. Subhas Chandra, recently won two acclaimed awards at the distinguished MENA CFO Awards.

The MENA CFO Awards was organized by Naseba as part of the 2-day CFO Strategies Forum MENA, and was held at the Taj Hotel in Dubai, United Arab Emirates. Over 200 leading chief financial officers in the region attended the premier ceremony and their accomplishments in their respective fields were celebrated by honouring them with illustrious awards spanning six substantial categories. The award is given after going through nominations invited from MENA CFO from across the public and private sectors. The Jury then selects the honourees after a rigorous evaluation process.

Mr. Subhas Chandra, the Chief Financial Officer of Diyar Al Muharraq, had an extraordinary showing at the awards, both earning the title of Finance Professional of the Year and ranking second in the Revolutionary CFO of the Year category, capping a strong year for the finance professional.

Speaking on the occasion, Chief Executive Officer of Diyar Al Muharraq, Dr. Maher Al Shaer said: We are immensely pleased to celebrate the success attained by our Chief Financial Officer, Mr. Subhas Chandra, at the MENA CFO Awards. This achievement reflects Diyar Al Muharraqs keenness to invest in the growth and professional expertise of its personnel in all its departments, and rather than rest on our laurels, these recognitions only inspire us to exceed our current standards and achieve an even higher level of creativity and productivity. We would like to express our sincere gratitude and deep appreciation for all the efforts made by our esteemed colleague in achieving this great distinction among his peers in the region, as we proudly embrace his success as our own.

From his side, Chief Financial Officer of Diyar Al Muharraq, Mr. Subhas Chandra said: It is a great honor to be given the opportunity to represent both myself and Diyar Al Muharraq at the renowned MENA CFO Awards, and to be recognized in not one, but two categories amongst a group of my peers that make up the most accomplished finance professionals in the region. Therefore, it brings me great personal pride to be titled as the Finance Professional of the Year and be named second in the Revolutionary CFO of the Year. I take this opportunity to express my gratitude to Dr. Maher for structuring an environment that breeds high levels of productivity and a need for constant success. It is indeed an immense pleasure to work under his visionary leadership qualities. And as he has led by example right from the beginning, I would like to dedicate these awards to the integral role he has played as a guiding beacon to success.

Naseba connects leaders, entrepreneurs, executives and individuals to create lasting impact, whether from a business or socioeconomic perspective. Nasebas leadership forums are platforms for organisations and individuals to address business critical and socioeconomic issues.The forums address todays issues, including diversity and inclusion, people management and financial strategy. The focus is on enacting positive change  these platforms deliver tangible strategies which drive conversation from intent to impact.

title.en: Diyar Al Muharraq Announces the Exhibition of its Projects at the Luxury Property Show Shanghai 2018

displayTitle.en: Diyar Al Muharraq Announces the Exhibition of its Projects at the Luxury Property Show Shanghai 2018

body.en:
Diyar Al Muharraq, one of the leading urban developers in the Kingdom of Bahrain, announced its participation in the Luxury Property Show Shanghai 2018, in the city of Shanghai, Republic of China, which was held over the course of three days from the 7th to the 9th of December, 2018.

As part of the Company's continuous efforts to further strengthen its leading position in the global market as one of the largest real estate projects in the Middle East, Diyar Al Muharraq exhibited a number of its most prominent and prestigious freehold properties to the expos visitors, including the Al Bareh seafront and Al Naseem waterfront projects. Its participation also highlights the Developers keenness to attract a wide range of individual and corporate investors from around the world who want to benefit from its diverse residential solutions. Furthermore, in light of its previous successes in sales through its participation in a number of international real estate exhibitions in the past, the company is also looking to solidify its presence in the real estate development sector on both regional and international levels.

The Diyar Al Muharraq projects on show are characterized by their diversity in designs, characteristics and sizes, designed so in order to meet the varying needs and tastes of customers. Al Bareh offers luxurious residential villas and plots with designs that communicate care and precision in every detail, while Al Naseem offers luxurious residential solutions in a unique and exceptional style, and a charming atmosphere, thus delivering the complete luxury vacation experience.

On this occasion, the Chief Executive Officer of Diyar Al Muharraq, Dr. Maher Al Shaer, said: In line with our efforts to highlight our projects on both regional and international levels, and to reach larger audiences and tourists from around the world, we are very pleased to have participated in the LPS Shanghai 2018, in the republic of China, alongside other leading real estate developers from around the world such as China, the United States of America, Canada and the United Kingdom. Through this participation, Diyar Al Muharraq aims to attract foreign investment to the Kingdom, as well as to consolidate the Companys standing among the most prominent real estate developers in the world.

At the Expo, we displayed a selection of our most prominent residential opportunities, with the Al Naseem and Al Bareh freehold projects being two of the most prominent, and showed prospects the state of the art technologies and designs that we adopt in all our projects. We are honored to have had the opportunity to be a part such a prestigious exhibition, as we believe in the importance of our presence in helping us achieve greater success and recognition around the world, and we look forward to participating in other international real estate exhibitions in the near future as well, he added.

The eighteenth consecutive edition of LPS Shanghai 2018 welcomed over 200 luxury real estate companies presenting unique estates from all over the world. The exhibition was held at the Shanghai Exhibition Center, where it received 12,000 VIP visitors from around the world, and hosted more than 50 real estate forums.

Diyar Al Muharraq is a unique master planned city for the people of Bahrain offering range of housing options and quality lifestyle. Diyar Al Muharraq offers a cohesive mix of residential and commercial properties with a strong lineup of projects aimed at creating a long term and sophisticated township.

Diyar Al Muharraq hosted an in-house celebration on Thursday, the 13th of December, 2018 to commemorate the occasion of Bahrain National Day. The celebratory event was held at Diyar Al Muharraq's sales office and was open to all members of its staff as well as management.

Diyar Al Muharraq  Announces Latest Projects Infrastructure Updates

displayTitle.en: Diyar Al Muharraq  Announces Latest Projects Infrastructure Updates

body.en:
Diyar Al Muharraq, one of the leading urban developers in the Kingdom of Bahrain, announced the latest update on the infrastructural work carried out throughout the development.

Striving to complete all the infrastructure work with high quality and in a timely manner, Diyar Al Muharraq recently completed three major roads within its development which will increase accessibility for visitors and residents alike. The Company has spent BD 27 million to build an integrated multi-lane highway network within the project that is approximately 17 km long in total. Furthermore, by the end of 2019, Diyar Al Muharraq will start building a bridge that will link the southern and northern islands of its development.

Along with the developments integrated and advanced telephony and data services, Diyar Al Muharraq has laid 10 km of its overall fibre network which will provide faster connection to its residents. This is being done in conjunction with Batelco. On the sewerage aspect, the developer is on course to completing the deep gravity sewer with a value of about BD 18 million by the end of January 2019. The deep gravity sewer will be capable of serving 60,000 residents in the southern side of Diyar Al Muharraq. 

Speaking on the occasion, the Chief Executive Officer of Diyar Al Muharraq, Dr. Maher Al Shaer said: On behalf of Diyar Al Muharraq, we are pleased to announce to the public our latest infrastructure work and achievements, which highlights our efforts in completing all the developments projects in a timely manner. It also reflects our endeavor in providing Diyar Al Muharraqs residents with the best infrastructure services, including telecommunications, roads, electricity & water, and sewerage networks. All these remarkable achievements contribute to the manifestation of our integrated vision for Diyar Al Muharraq day by day.

Diyar Al Muharraq has been a pioneer in the Kingdom of Bahrain and the region, due to the diversity and abundance of residential and investment projects, which attracts Bahrainis, GCC citizens and foreigners alike. We therefore pay close attention to every detail of our work to emphasize on the high standards that the Company incorporates in building a comprehensive infrastructure network that serves to fulfill residents different needs, he added.

Diyar Al Muharraq has completed building and energizing 8 primary substations distributed throughout the development, and it is now serving the projects located on the southern side of the city. The primary power networks cost has reached BD 50 million to date. Furthermore, the company is preparing to build the first primary substation in the northern island of Diyar Al Muharraq.

Diyar Al Muharraq is a unique master planned city for the people of Bahrain offering a range of housing options and quality lifestyle. Diyar Al Muharraq offers a cohesive mix of residential and commercial properties with a strong lineup of projects aimed at creating a long term and sophisticated township.

title.en: Diyar Al Muharraq Announces Its Diamond Sponsorship of  Bahrain Real Estate Investment Expo 2019

displayTitle.en: Diyar Al Muharraq Announces Its Diamond Sponsorship of  Bahrain Real Estate Investment Expo 2019

body.en:
Diyar Al Muharraq, one of the leading urban developers in the Kingdom of Bahrain, announced its participation in and Diamond Sponsorship of the 2019 Bahrain Real Estate Investment Expo (BRIX19), which will be held at City Centre Bahrain from the 7th to the 9th of February, 2019.

The signing of the Diamond Sponsorship Agreement for the 2019 Bahrain Real Estate Investment Expo took place on Thursday, the 17th of January 2019, between Dr. Maher Al Shaer, the Chief Executive Officer of Diyar Al Muharraq, and Ms. Aseel Al Mohandis, the Managing Director of Expressions, the event organizer.

Diyar Al Muharraq aims through this participation to showcase two of its leading projects that offer ideal freehold opportunities, Al Bareh and Al Naseem. Al Naseem comprises of 4 villa types, namely Duha El-Nasayem, Sabaah El-Nasayem, Aseel El-Nasayem and Layl El-Nasayem. All these models are designed with unique features and standalone characteristics, delivering the complete luxury vacation experience. The villas feature interior designs that show care and precision in every detail, with a wide living area that embraces a wholesome family lifestyle.

Similarly, Al Bareh is considered one of the most prominent projects in Diyar Al Muharraq. It is a sophisticated residential community situated in a prime location on the west of the master-planned development and features beautiful seafront views. Its villas are built on seafront plots of two types, El Bahar 1 and El Bahar 2, while the Dareen and Eshail models are built on the Project's inner plots. Each of these villas has different features, characteristics and sizes designed to meet the needs of a wide range of clients.

Speaking on the occasion, Dr. Maher Al Shaer, the Chief Executive Officer of Diyar Al Muharraq, said: We at Diyar Al Muharraq are deeply pleased to announce our participation in and diamond sponsorship of the latest iteration of the Bahrain Real Estate Investment Expo and to showcase our premium residential and investment solutions alongside our peers in the real estate development sector. Our participation reflects our continuous efforts to introduce a wider segment of the public to the diverse real estate opportunities in Diyar Al Muharraq. Therefore, our exhibition highlights the Al Naseem residential project overlooking the waterways and the Al Bareh waterfront project, both of which offer luxurious villas with a variety of designs to suit different tastes and needs, with the latter providing plots with different sizes as well, making them ideal choices for a wide range of clientele.

"The Bahrain Real Estate Investment Expo (BRIX) will contribute to the growth of the Kingdom's economy and will bring together an expansive and elite class of developers, real estate experts, entrepreneurs and real estate investment companies, as well as see involvement from the government agencies that are prominently involved in the real estate development sector in the Kingdom. We are proud to participate in this event, and I am honored to invite everyone to visit us and get a glimpse of the exclusive opportunities that Diyar Al Muharraq has to offer, he added.

The Bahrain Real Estate Investment Expo 2019 is a vital platform for exhibiting a range of real estate projects in the Kingdom and bringing together real estate developers and investors from across the region for 3 consecutive days. The exhibition also aims at revitalizing and developing the Bahraini real estate development sector by attracting foreign investments.

Diyar Al Muharraq is a unique master planned city for the people of Bahrain offering range of housing options and quality lifestyle. Diyar Al Muharraq offers a cohesive mix of residential and commercial properties with a strong lineup of projects aimed at creating a long term and sophisticated township.

body.en:
Diyar Al Muharraq, one of the leading urban developers in the Kingdom of Bahrain, announced its participation as a Silver Sponsor of Unbound Bahrain 2019, which will be held at The National Theatre on the 6th and 7th of March 2019, under the patronage of His Royal Highness Prince Salman bin Hamad Al Khalifa, Crown Prince, Deputy Supreme Commander and Chairman of the Economic Development Board (EDB).

Unbound Bahrain is a globally established, award-winning innovation festival that celebrates the Kingdoms commitment to fuelling a digital future for the MENA region.

The signing of the Silver Sponsorship Agreement for the innovation festival took place on Thursday, the 28th of February 2019, between Dr. Maher Al Shaer, the Chief Executive Officer of Diyar Al Muharraq, and Mr. David Mackenzie, the Partnerships Manager of Unbound Bahrain.

The sponsorship includes that discussions on the Panel themed Power Of PropTech, How Real Estate Technology Is Creating Smarter Spaces will be centered around the visionary integration of revolutionary new technologies and pioneering concepts within Diyar Al Muharraq, highlighting its status as one of the most prominent developers in the Kingdom of Bahrain.

Speaking on the occasion, Dr. Maher Al Shaer, the Chief Executive Officer of Diyar Al Muharraq, said: It brings me immense pleasure to announce our sponsorship of Unbound Bahrain as we strongly believe that events such as these are vital to our progress towards a successful future for the Kingdom of Bahrain. With Property Technology (PropTech) being a rapidly growing concept due to the exponential increase in the use of technology in the real estate sector, in the duration of our sponsored panel discussion, we will be taking an immersive look into how this state-of-the-art technology is developed and deployed by the real estate sector to create smarter cities.

The 2-day event serves as a platform for the finest minds in A.I., fintech, sustainability, energy, investment, blockchain, digital wellbeing and more, to make invaluable connections and discover inspirational insight and emerging technologies that will shape the future of the business community and therefore, the economy.

Unbound Bahrain brings together highly successful and renowned entrepreneurs, idealists and economic leaders in the same room in an environment that facilitates a free flow of information and creativity, thereby laying the foundation for productive changes right from the highest levels. Therefore it is an honour to be supporting this noble cause and we look forward to the success of the festival, he added.

Unbound Bahrain is the anchor event of Startup Bahrain Week, a community-led festival that brings together the regions most exciting startup events and connects some of the brightest entrepreneurial minds. Currently in its second edition, the event is held in partnership with the Bahrain Economic Development Board (EDB) and supported by StartUp Bahrain.

Unbound Bahrain will attract and bridge the gap between 3,000+ startups, investors and businesses, who will travel to Bahrain to hear from 100+ influential speakers, uncover pioneering ideas and take part in immersive brand experiences, hackathons, startup battles and networking sessions.

title.en: Diyar Al Muharraq Partners with Era Projects for New  Developments

displayTitle.en: Diyar Al Muharraq Partners with Era Projects for New  Developments

body.en:
Diyar Al Muharraq, one of the leading urban developers in Bahrain, announced the signing of an agreement with Era Projects, in line with Diyar Al Muharraqs aim to enrich the project with major developers.

As part of the agreement, Era Projects will acquire a parcel of land to develop a residential community with Diyar Al Muharraq. The residential community will comprise of luxury units in line with Diyar Al Muharraqs distinctive offerings. The freeholder properties will be launched in the second half of 2019 for potential customers who are looking to explore a modern lifestyle in an integrated city.

The signing ceremony took place between the CEO of Diyar Al Muharraq, Dr. Maher Al Shaer and the CEO of Era Projects Mr. Abdulhussain Khadhur, with both expressing their happiness towards this partnership that will positively contribute to Kingdoms real estate sector. 

On this occasion, Dr. Maher al Shaer commented, We are pleased to enter this partnership with one of the most prominent real estate developers in the Kingdom, who will uplift Diyar Al Muharraq by adding a vibrant residential community. We look forward to adding a luxury project under Diyar Al Muharraqs umbrella, and look forward to this fruitful partnership.

On behalf of Era Projects, Mr. Abdulhussain Khadhur said, Diyar Al Muharraq is one of the largest developments in the Kingdom of Bahrain with attractive residential, touristic and leisure elements and we are pleased to announce our partnership, which allows us to develop freehold units within the largest urban housing development in Bahrain. 

A unique master planned city for the people of Bahrain, Diyar Al Muharraq offers a range of housing options and quality lifestyle. Offering a cohesive mix of residential and commercial properties, Diyar Al Muharraq has a strong lineup of projects aimed at creating a long term and sophisticated township.

title.en: Diyar Al Muharraq Showcases its Latest Projects at Cityscape 2019 Held in Jeddah

displayTitle.en: Diyar Al Muharraq Showcases its Latest Projects at Cityscape 2019 Held in Jeddah

body.en:
Diyar Al Muharraq, one of the leading urban developers in the Kingdom of Bahrain, announced its inaugural participation as an exhibitor in the upcoming Cityscape Jeddah held between the 5th and 7th of April.

Diyar Al Muharraq is set to be among one of the top regional and international developers taking part in the event aimed at highlighting the regions latest real estate projects.

This milestone is a major step for Diyar Al Muharraq as the developer aim to promote its latest and most luxurious projects, Al Naseem and Al Bareh  one of the key projects of Diyar Al Muharraqs masterplan.

Both projects are positioned as upscale waterside developments with breathtaking views; with Al Naseem including an integrated residential community made up of four types of unique villas named: Sabaah El Nasayem, Duha El Nasayem, Aseel El Nasayem and Layl El Nasayem, in addition to entertainment facilities and a waterfront shopping area providing all the modern living needs for residents.

Al Bareh, located in the western area of Diyar Al Muharraq and overlooking the Arabian Gulf, provides the best modern residential options and the ultimate investment opportunity, with its designed villas that incorporate the latest smart home technologies along with residential plots. Al Bareh is strategically located next to the main highway; providing an ease of access to schools, healthcare and essential neighborhood amenities.

We are proud that Diyar Al Muharraq will take part in this prestigious exhibition in order to showcase and promote its exceptional developments. Saudi Arabia offers tremendous opportunities to achieve further growth and expand our business, targeting the largest market in the region, said the Chief Executive Officer of Diyar Al Muharraq, Dr Maher Al Shaer.

Our participation is a momentous opportunity and we are hoping that this participation will be fruitful and reflect positively on the success of Diyar Al Muharraq. We look forward to meeting interested investors and clients. We will also take this opportunity to network with top players in the real estate sector, he added.

Cityscape Jeddah is set to deliver its 8th edition this year and is considered one of the leading regional exhibitions in the real estate sector. Thousands of developers, investors and experts take part in the event to exchange knowledge. Also, thousands of VIP guests and the public visit this event.

title.en: Diyar Al Muharraq Announces Latest Infrastructure Updates on its Southern Island

displayTitle.en: Diyar Al Muharraq Announces Latest Infrastructure Updates on its Southern Island

body.en:
Manama, 28 May 2019: Infrastructure work on Diyar Al Muharraqs Southern Island, has achieved significant progress and is being implemented in line with the construction schedule according to the developer. 

Some key updates on the project include: Completion of the main road on Diyar Al Muharraqs Southern Island and the start of the road landscaping, scheduled to be ready by September 2019. Work on the water distribution station which holds a capacity of 11 million gallons of treated water to be used for landscaping, is 50% completed; while ongoing works are being carried out on the secondary roads in Al Noor and Al Sherooq,  in line with the approved schedule put in place for the Jeewan project.

In addition, six primary 66kV substations along with approximately 159 substations of 11kV have been completed and are operational, and 100% fiber optic containment on all existing roads has been completed.

Diyar Al Muharraq has also announced the completion of secondary infrastructure works on the following projects: Deerat Al Oyoun, Sarat, Al Baraha Souq, Al Qamra and Al Bareh. Infrastructure work on the second phase of Al Bareh has commenced and will be completed in 2020.

The vibrant residential community, Sarat, is strategically located near the entrance of Diyar Al Muharraq and is surrounded by the largest green park in a sophisticated and quiet residential area. 

Located in the heart of Diyar Al Muharraq, Deerat Al Oyoun has been designed to be the ideal location for living in a residential complex characterized by a comfortable social atmosphere at convenient prices, with easy access to facilities, shops and schools.

The villas at the Al Noor and Al Sherooq projects have been designed in a traditional style representing the Bahraini family while reflecting modern standards. These neighborhoods demonstrate the traditional aspects of Muharraq combined with Eastern heritage designs. 

On this occasion, the CEO of Diyar Al Muharraq Dr. Maher al Shaer stated, We are very pleased with the steady progress being made on Diyar Al Muharraqs master plan and we appreciate the efforts, hard work and diligence of all those who are contributing to meeting the infrastructure schedules, and setting the bar for our real estate industry internationally. We are very keen to maintain transparency on Diyars progress and will continue to release latest updates on our project in a timely manner.

Diyar Al Muharraq is the largest integrated residential community in the Kingdom of Bahrain, featuring a refined lifestyle with diverse amenities and a variety of accommodation options. This is in addition to Diyar Al Muharraqs unique mix of residential, commercial and leisure facilities that complement the modern and integrated city model.

Register Your Interest Today! ## Warehouse Plots In A Glance: - Plot size starts from 1,300 SQM - Located near Dragon City - Close location to Bahrain International Airport and Mina Khalifa - Easy access to main highway road network - Nearby one of the largest shopping malls in Bahrain, hospitals, clinics, hotels & mosques

New Educational Institutions set to open in Diyar Al Muharraq In line with efforts to develop Education Sector in the Kingdom of Bahrain

displayTitle.en: New Educational Institutions set to open in Diyar Al Muharraq  In line with efforts to develop Education Sector in the Kingdom of Bahrain

body.en:
Diyar Al Muharraq, one of the leading urban developers in Bahrain, extends its efforts in contributing to enrich the educational sector in the Kingdom of Bahrain through providing elite educational institutions in the project. The master plan will include 8 schools and 2 universities, one of which is a medical university. This comes in line with Diyars mandate to integrate projects and services within the master plan that cater to the needs of the residents and the community.

In addition to Noor Al Diyar Private School which opened in 6 December 2017, Diyar Al Muharraq recently announced plans to open The Canadian School which will receive its first batch of students next September. Also in the pipeline are Abdul Rahman Kanoo School Diyar and the Applied Sciences University which will open their doors in Diyar Al Muharraq in the coming years.

Establishing educational institutions of this caliber is a unique step in the concept of building comprehensive modern cities where students will have the opportunity to enroll to top schools that aim to improve their skills, capabilities, qualities as well as developing the next generation of leaders and decision makers.

On this occasion, Dr. Maher Al Shaer, Chief Executive Officer of Diyar Al Muharraq commented, The Kingdom of Bahrain has always been a beacon of knowledge and learning throughout its history, and this is why we are keen on making sure we continue to strengthen this reputation by attracting prestigious educational institutions on a regional and international level which include various disciplines for all educational levels. We also look forward to offering more schools, educational institutions, commercial, leisure and health facilities in order to achieve Diyar Al Muharraqs vision of becoming a modern and integrated city that caters to the needs of residents, visitors and tourists.

The different schools in Diyar Al Muharraq offer parents a variety of quality educational experiences by leading teachers and academics capable of bringing out the students full potential and providing them a skillset to guarantee life-time success. The curriculums offered

combine the best education that allow students to continue their higher studies abroad while maintaining the values of the Bahraini culture and heritage.

Noor Al Diyar Private School is the first private school to open in Diyar. It is fully equipped to teach the Cambridge Curriculum leading to IGCSE AS and A Levels, and currently accommodates kindergarten and primary student. It offers intensive care for children at the earliest stage of their lives as well as offer attractive classrooms, making this school very popular with parents. It offers strong and positive ethos and nurtures children to reach their full potential in a safe and happy environment, fostering growth, development and creativity.

The Canadian School Bahrain, which covers an area of 30,000 square meters, will be accepting students in September 2019. It offers the British Columbia curriculum with a primary goal to achieve unparalleled high academic standards by Canada. The school also integrates Arabic Language, Bahrain Social Studies & Citizenship, and Islamic Studies curriculum approved by the Ministry of Education in Bahrain.

Abdul Rahman Kanoo School Diyar and the Applied Sciences University will also establish new campuses in the Diyar Al Muharraq. Abdul Rahman Kanoo International School Diyar offers outstanding bilingual education and aims to make students active members of society. It is the 1st school in Bahrain to receive joint accreditation from CIS (Council of International School) and NEASC (New England Association of Schools and Colleges) and offers IB (The International Baccalaureate) to grades 11 and 12. Applied Sciences University (ASU) is a leading higher education institution combining practice and theory. It aims to help nationals become effective leaders in their respective fields. Also, two plots have been assigned for government schools in the first and second phases of Deerat Al Oyoun project.

Diyar Al Muharraq is the largest integrated residential community in the Kingdom of Bahrain, featuring a refined lifestyle with diverse amenities and a variety of accommodation options. This is in addition to Diyar Al Muharraqs unique mix of residential, commercial, leisure and medical facilities that complement the modern and integrated city model.

Diyar Al Muharraq Supports the Launch of the Largest Underwater Theme Park in the World and Contributes in Revitalizing Marine Life

displayTitle.en: Diyar Al Muharraq Supports the Launch of the Largest Underwater Theme Park in the World and Contributes in Revitalizing Marine Life

body.en:
## In line with Supporting the National Economy, Sustainability and promoting Eco-friendly Tourism
Diyar Al Muharraq, one of the leading developers in the Kingdom of Bahrain, announced its support to the Ministry of Industry, Commerce and Tourism and its continued collaboration with the Bahrain Tourism and Exhibitions Authority to establish the worlds largest underwater theme park, which was recently announced during a press conference at the beginning of June 2019 and was attended by leading government officials, members of the public and professional divers and enthusiasts.

The theme park, which is located around 50km from Diyar Al Muharraq, aims to revive the marine ecosystem within an ideal environment helping it to grow and thrive as well as to ensure biodiversity in Bahraini waters. The theme park is set to become a hub for amateur and professional drivers from around the world, offering a unique tourism experience in a region known for its rich marine environment.

During the press conference held on the 10th of June to announce the commencement of works on this project, officials made statements regarding new features of the park, which will cover an area of 100,000 m2. The parks main feature is a 70m long Boeing 747 that has been submerged to help preserve marine environment and its perpetuity. The second main feature of the park is a replica of a traditional Bahraini pearl merchant's house, which will be submerged next to the plane serving as a sustainable marine habitat, in harmony with the environment and a major attraction for divers from all over the world. Diyar Al Muharraq is overseeing the design and construction of the house.

Dr Maher Al Shaer, CEO of Diyar Al Muharraq said: Taking part in this National initiative comes in line with our efforts to revive marine life in the Kingdom and following the leading international standards for environmental sustainability as well as supporting the tourism sector. We have worked closely with the Bahrain Tourism and Exhibitions Authority to design and build a replica of a traditional pearl merchants house, covering an area of 900m2 as part of the world class park to attract divers.

The park, set to open by August 2019, is a result of the partnership between several public and private entities, to create a unique tourist attraction ensuring marine life sustainability, in order to preserve Bahrains marine ecological system, by stimulating coral reefs as well as encouraging marine tourism. This project will become a major attraction to marine researchers and will raise awareness about the ever-growing importance for keeping marine habitats safe.

title.en: Press Release Thai Mart Opening Announcemnt and Grant Contractor

displayTitle.en: ThaiMart Awards Crown Electro  Mechanical Services as Main Contractor

body.en:
- ThaiMart first of its kind in the region, Set to Launch in Q4 2019 in Diyar Al Muharraq. - 60% of retail space leased and committed. ThaiMart remains on track to open in the fourth quarter of this year in the iconic masterplan Diyar Al Muharraq, one of the most visionary and progressive urban developments in the Kingdom of Bahrain. ThaiMart is set to be the regions first Thai-Inspired shopping destination. ThaiMart awarded the contract for the construction of the new shopping destination to Crown Electro Mechanical Services as the official Vega ThaiMart W.L.L contractor during a signing ceremony which took place at the Sales Office in Diyar Al Muharraq on 17 July 2019. The mall has made significant progress so far, with 60% of their retail spaces leased and committed. Commenting on this occasion, Akavut Tangsilikusonwong, Chief Executive Officer, Vega ThaiMart W.L.L. said, With stable development on both construction and leasing, immeasurable support from Diyar Al Muharraq and different Thailand Government Sectors, we look forward to launching ThaiMart to the public during the last quarter of this year and offer a unique and diverse shopping, dining and entertainment experiences for the families and visitors. Dr. Maher Al Shaer, Managing Director - Dragon City Company on this occasion said, We are very pleased with the announcement made today and delighted to see the development in construction and progress achieved so far. Staying true to its promise, Diyar Al Muharraq continues to focus its effort on delivering a unique offering and ThaiMart comes as part of its strategy to provide unique offerings within the business district and next to Dragon City that is proof to be great success in providing diverse retail experience within Diyar Al Muharraq. The solid business relationship between Thailand and Bahrain resulted in the birth of Thai Mart. With continuous economic support from both allies, they develop a long and strong cooperation which supports the new iconic Thai shopping destination at the southwest corner of Diyar Al Muharraq, Bahrain. Diyar Al Muharraq is known to be the right location with the right environment for ThaiMart and after assessing the advantages for this location, Mr. Tangsilikusonwong added that Diyar Al Muharraqs business district is the perfect place for ThaiMart to showcase Thailands authentic products to the Kingdom of Bahrain. The project is scheduled for handover on or before October 1, 2019 and by then the site will be open for most of the mall tenants to come in and start their fit-out works. ThaiMart aims to provide a wide-range of striking Thai architecture, showcasing the trendiest and most exciting Thai products and services under one roof. It will also propel the shopping understanding with its impressive lineup of Thai retailers unsurpassed by any mall in Bahrain. ThaiMart will have a food court with tasteful Thai, international restaurants and regional chains. Jewelry zones, kids area and shopping alleys designed with safety and accessibility optimization to the retail outlets. ### About Vega Group: Vega Group, remains true to its company culture Go Further , is committed to bring the excellence of Thai businesses and services in the Middle East. With more than 15 years of experience and expertise in organizing commercial exhibitions, continuing to provide opportunities for the Thai retail businesses to bring their products and services to the Middle East, especially the Gulf countries of Bahrain, Kuwait, Oman, Qatar, Saudi Arabia and United Arab Emirates. Vega Group was founded in 2003 by Mr. Akavut Tangsilikusonwong, the journey commenced from Thailand and expanded its office to Dubai in 2011 with the objective of creating business opportunities for Thai SMEs in the Middle East and North Africa (MENA) region. For more information, please contact
__Vega Public Relations Department__
Tel: +971 4 2510451 | Fax: +971 4 2510452 | event@vegainter.com

text.en: Ongoing data-gathering efforts include baseline environmental studies, water quality monitoring, ecological monitoring and an Environmental Compensation Plan. It was the first development project in the GCC to adopt an Environmental Management System as part of its overall EMP, and has partnered with the United Nations Environment Programme (UNEP) to improve its own environmental impact assessment practices. To better manage potential environmental impacts, the project uses the DIANA system to get real-time environmental data, and contractors across the organisation are continually monitored by environmental experts in order to improve sustainability practices.

Situated on the west side of Diyar Al Muharraq, Al Barehs prime location boasts incredible views over the pristine seafront and main canal. A true reflection of Diyar Al Muharraqs inclusive and integrated philosophy and eco-conscious values, plots at Al Bareh are available as freehold for all nationalities, and will encompass an array of community facilities and stunning outdoor spaces.
